Groups.Name: Agile Yorkshire
Groups.Description: Exists to make our region a fantastic place to build software. The agile movement is changing the way businesses think and our community is a participant in that process.  We are champions of no nonsense software delivery.

Groups.Name: DigitaLeeds
Groups.Description: digital stuff. in Leeds

Groups.Name: Drupal Yorkshire
Groups.Description: Bringing together people that are using Drupal at all levels, sharing knowledge and ideas.

Groups.Name: Forefront Leeds
Groups.Description: A community for Leeds based front-end devs and designers.

Groups.Name: Hey!Stac
Groups.Description: Talking design, business and tech.

Groups.Name: Leeds Data Thing
Groups.Description: Leeds Data Thing is a group for like-minded people working in Leeds to talk about data, network, share ideas, learn a few things and enjoy a beer or two!

Groups.Name: Leeds DevOps
Groups.Description: A hub for everyone who lives, breathes and occasionally sleeps DevOps in Leeds and the surrounding area.
Groups.Schedule: 7pm Tues 26th Nov 2013 at The Central. Hoping to arrange regular schedule in new year.

Groups.Name: Leeds Hackspace
Groups.Description: A Maker and Hacker Space in Leeds.

Groups.Name: Leeds JS
Groups.Description: JavaScript user group in the Leeds, West Yorkshire area.

Groups.Name: Leeds Lady Geeks
Groups.Description: Talks, workshops, networking, and socialising for women developers, coders, hackers, designers, makers, and digital media enthusiasts. (Or those who want to be one!) This group will be a casual monthly meet-up for women in tech in Leeds to share knowledge, build skills and meet people. All skill levels are welcome, from beginner or amateur to professional.

Groups.Name: Leeds Meeples
Groups.Description: Meetup to play very geeky board games in a relaxed, non-serious manner.

Groups.Name: Leeds PHP
Groups.Description: A small bunch of passionate PHP Developers based in the Leeds and surrounding areas, who meet up once a month to discuss all things PHP.

Groups.Name: Leeds Riak
Groups.Description: A Leeds based meet-Up for those interested in Riak, distributed systems, NoSql, and app development.

Groups.Name: Leeds Ruby Thing
Groups.Description: Leeds Ruby Thing is a regular informal social event for anyone interested in the Ruby programming language. You don't have to be an expert in Ruby - we're just a friendly bunch who enjoy beer and geeky chat.

Groups.Name: Leeds Sharp
Groups.Description: A code club for developers using Microsoft technologies.

Groups.Name: Lean Startup Yorks.
Groups.Description: Lean Startup Yorkshire community provides a meeting place to learn, network and explore Yorkshire startup community.

Groups.Name: Leeds Tester Gathering
Groups.Description: A community event run for testers by testers.

Groups.Name: NodeUpNorth
Groups.Description: Home of a Node.js user group that meets in Leeds.

Groups.Name: The West Yorkshire Gnu/Linux Users' Group (WYLUG)
Groups.Description: A self-help group for GNU/Linux and Free / Open Source Software users in the West Yorkshire area

Groups.Name: West Yorkshire Python User Group (WYPy)
Groups.Description: The West Yorkshire Python User Group (WYPy) have been meeting monthly since 2007. Our meetings are free, and usually include at least one talk, as well as a trip to the pub.
